The object on the right is then allowed to move and is released from rest. Which of the following claims best describes the subsequent motion of the sphere on the right?

choices.label: The sphere moves to the right with an acceleration that decreases with time.
The sphere moves to the right with a constant acceleration.
The sphere moves to the right with an acceleration that increases with time.
The sphere moves to the left with a constant acceleration.
The sphere moves to the left with an acceleration that decreases with time.

content.answer: The sphere moves to the right with an acceleration that decreases with time.
